title: Best baked French toast
ingredients: ['4 eggs', '150ml orange juice', '75ml milk', '4 tablespoons caster sugar', '1/4 teaspoon nutmeg', '1/4 teaspoon vanilla extract', '225g Italian bread, such as ciabatta, cut into 2.5cm slices', '75g unsalted butter, melted', '55g pecans, chopped', '2 tablespoons grated orange zest']
